hcc_text: Kappock Street is in the middle third in the Bronx for pedestrian deaths and serious injuries per mile.
info: At Kappock Street at Henry Hudson Parkway East, Henry Hudson Parkway Nb Exit 18 and Knolls Crescent, there were 2 injuries in crashes between 2008 and 2012.
intersection: Kappock Street at Henry Hudson Parkway East, Henry Hudson Parkway Nb Exit 18 and Knolls Crescent
